channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Potential federal intervention poses challenges for Chicago police on the ground
item.description: As President Donald Trump signals plans to order federal intervention in Chicago, experts say the likely escalation of immigration enforcement operations is setting the stage for a contentious dynamic between local police and federal authorities.

item.title: Chicago churches urge calm resistance ahead of expected federal intervention
Florida’s plan to drop school vaccine rule won’t start for 90 days, won’t cover all diseases
